Header: 24 Division Begins Its Army Anniversary Programmes
Content: Troops of the 24 Division in Ampara began their 69th Army anniversary religious programmes on Wednesday (3) at St Ignatius Church at Ampara, attended by Major General Mahinda Mudalige, General Officer Commanding, 24 Division of the Security Force Headquarters - East (SFHQ-E). Colonel W Chandrasiri, 241 Brigade Commander, all Commanding Officers of under command Battalions of the 24 Division attended the service. Rev. Father Pradeep Roshantha of St. Ignatius Church and Father Thiruchelwam, Parish Church of Sorri Kalmunei, conducted the mass and blessed the Armyâ€™s forthcoming 69th Anniversary. Approximately 150 civilians mingled with Army personnel and participated in the Mass. Army flags were taken in procession to the church, backed by Sri Lanka Light Infantry Regimental Band. Buddhist, Hindu and Islamic prayer sessions will also take place during next couple of days.
